adviseScripts.text: Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Food supplies in the Outpost are dwindling.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'll only eat half-portions from now on.
We'll have to go without food.
That won't be necessary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: We do not need to eat at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: There's no need for you to make such a sacrifice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: We cannot do that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Giving up when the chips are down will only dampen everyone's spirits even further.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I investigate who could have been the culprit who exhausted the food supplies.
Commander, I am curious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: What are your opinions on private personal space?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It's nice. You can have some time to yourself.
It can get lonely sometimes.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I will take that into consideration when making plans.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Ah. As I presumed, there are both pros and cons.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I suppose there are two sides to every coin.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I spend some quiet time together with Rapi.
When we're not on an operation, we are free to do whatever we want.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: We spend a lot of time training, but even then, we often have a lot of time left over.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: As such, I've been thinking of picking up a hobby.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Just kick your feet up and while the hours away.
How about doing a different kind of training?
It's definitely tempting to spend the rest of my time like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: However, I was hoping I could do something meaningful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Another type of training?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It's a good suggestion, though it's not necessarily a hobby. Thank you for the advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I spend some free time together with Rapi.
The paperwork at Counters is simple enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: However, sometimes there isn't enough time to do it all on my own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Surely there must be a way to get things done more efficiently...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Have Anis and Neon help you.
I can help you.
I will pretend I didn't hear that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I couldn't accept that. You must always be ready to head out at a moment's notice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: But... it's the thought that counts. I do appreciate it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I hear all about Rapi's struggles with mounds of paperwork.
I'm not sure if I should say this. I don't want to be a tattletale, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Anis is starting to become unbearable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: She never cleans up, not even a little bit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'll talk to her.
You should show her what's what.
Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: That's out of the question. I'm not her superior.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi tells me more about how Anis' unbearable behaviors.
Anis opens and closes the refrigerator door too often.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: She ended up breaking it a few days ago. Fortunately, Liter came and fixed it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I don't understand why Anis acts this way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Maybe she just wants to blow off steam?
There's a legend that if you open and close it 100 times, pudding will come out.
I don't think that's the reason.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: She had a blanket wrapped around her when she opened it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: ... Commander, I don't believe in such ridiculous tall tales.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: But if Anis believes it, then there's nothing I can do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'll just have to leave her to her own devices.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Rapi about the most popular refrigerator models.
Why hasn't the shower in our dorm been fixed?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Mighty Tools came by to repair it, but nothing's changed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Could there be something else going on?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: You just reminded me of a ghost story.
Yep, there's definitely a ghost in the showers.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I, uh, I have go to. Bye.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: A ghost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I don't believe in ghosts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: No... absolutely not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: N-not one bit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi bolts out of the room.
A while ago, Neon lost a shell. She stayed up all night and looked for it everywhere.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I helped her, and we were eventually able to find it, but... I was jealous of Neon.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I was jealous that she had something that mattered so much to her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I wonder... will I ever find something that means that much to me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: We can take our time finding it. Together.
What about me?
Very well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I do hope we find something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: ... I'm not sure about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I discuss the things we hold dear.
I had a dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: A butterfly with sparkling wings landed on my hand, then disappeared as soon as the light hit it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: What does it mean?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It's about something precious being broken.
It's about your troubles melting away.
So it was a nightmare.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I should watch my back today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I suppose that's one interpretation...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for cheering me up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I talk about dreams with Rapi.
I'm not a picky eater, but having the same thing several days in a row can get tiring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: However, given our current food situation, I shouldn't complain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I should do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Complain while you eat.
Just grin and bear it.
I see. If things aren't going to change anyway, there's no harm in letting off some steam.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It will be a nice way to vent. Thank you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: You mean to say that, if we're powerless to change something, then we should just accept it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Very well. That's what I've been doing up until now, anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I talk about food preferences with Rapi.
Lately, there have been more Nikkes at the Outpost than usual.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: On the plus side, it's increased the number of troops we have available, but it's also led to a few more altercations and other incidents.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: We should open our own court.
We can go on patrol together.
We've already got one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It's just never been used properly
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Right, everyone is so fond of you that they may not be willing to cause a ruckus so openly if you're around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Just let me know what time works for you, and I'll let you join me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I discussed how to maintain peace in the Outpost.
Anis and Neon are always bickering over something trivial,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: but there is at least one thing where they're in complete agreement.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Is it when they're teasing you?
Is it when they complain about the food?
So you already knew?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It's starting to become a concern. Especially since it seems there's no end in sight.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: That is also true but,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: even then they still tend to get into it at times.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Rapi voice her concerns about her squadmates.
Have you ever imagined how it felt
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: to live in the old days?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure there was a greater sense of justice back then.
People probably led much safer lives back then.
I'm not so sure I agree with you there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'm fairly sure that unfairness pervaded many aspects of life even back in the day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Not being constantly filled with doubt... not worrying whether or not they will even be a tomorrow...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: The people back then didn't realize how lucky they were.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I discovered some old footage of the before times.
It's only fair to take turns doing the laundry, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Neon always uses such strong detergent.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: How can I prevent this from happening?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Tell Neon that simply using extra-strength detergent won't actually make her any stronger.
Your already short skirt will end up becoming even shorter.
I'll be sure to relay that message to her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I see you've been following this issue with rapt attention as well, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I talk about proper laundry methods.
Commander, If we ever reclaim the surface, what's the first thing you would do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'd go on a nice spring picnic outdoors.
I'd start looking for a job.
A picnic under the sun...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It may not seem like much, but if you ask me, it's still worth fighting for.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: That's very... practical of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: So much so that it's kind of depressing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I imagined what the future would be like.
I happened to overhear some of the Nikkes talking about me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Apparently they find me difficult to deal with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Do you feel that way as well, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: A little.
Not at all.
I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'll do what I can to try and change, but don't expect too much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Perfect, that's all I needed. Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I hang out having fun with personality tests.
I have a personal matter I'd like to discuss with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Say you were to encounter someone from a past relationship.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: How would you react?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'd be honest about any potential feelings I still had for them.
I'd try to avoid them if I could.
You mean... my true feelings?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: You of all people know, I'm not exactly good with opening up about this kind of thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: But if the opportunity presents itself, I'll give it a shot.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Unfortunately...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: We're in the same organization, so I doubt I'll be able to avoid them forever.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Rapi about her previous squad.
I'm curious about the time you spent at the Military Academy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Do any memories from that time stand out to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Sure, all the painful ones.
I don't remember much from that time.
I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: In that case, I admire your tenacity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: It's impressive that you overcame all of those obstacles to get where you are today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: People often repress traumatic or painful memories without even realizing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I hope that's not the case for you, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I look back on my days of being a cadet and share what I can remember with Rapi.
I feel Neon and Anis have been stopping by your room too often.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: For the sake of your own privacy, wouldn't it be better if you set up some ground rules?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: The more, the merrier.
I'm only one person, I'm powerless to stop them.
I guess that settles it then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'll just leave it be for now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: You're far too lenient with them, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Rapi and I have a discussion about privacy.
Commander, you were born in the Ark, yet you fight up on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Whenever the fight comes to an end, you come back to the Outpost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Which of those locations means the most to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: The surface.
The Outpost.
Well, it is a place where we risk our lives
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: trying to reclaim the surface myself included.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I'm not surprised you have such strong feelings for it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: The Outpost may not be perfect,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: but even taking all that into consideration, there are a lot of good memories here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps it's those memories that make you cherish this place so much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapi

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Rapi about various places and what they mean to us.
